question: Please list the syndromes that are part of Castleman's disease AKA TAFRO
ideal_answer: The syndromes that are part of Castleman's disease AKA TAFRO are:1) organomegaly, 2) anasarca, 3) myelofibrosis, 4) thrombocytopenia and 5) reticulin fibrosis.
